column4: hi everybody. I've got this peculiar problem on Ubuntu. Today i've created a partition on another harddrive using gparted and i placed all my user files in there. Music etc, also pics for wallpaper. I've set a wallpaper to something in the menu/appearance. When i reboot the system, the background image doesn't set
anyone knows what could be the problem?
check /etc/fstab and see where its mounting the drive
you're right, its not there. Can you tell me please how i add it? Im noob. thanks
